workflow.name: LinkedIn Job Scraper with Hiring Manager Extraction

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every Monday at 9 AM to begin the LinkedIn job scraping process for hiring manager extraction.
Calls Apify API to scrape LinkedIn job postings, retrieving job details including potential hiring manager information from job listings.
Processes the scraped job data to extract and format hiring manager information, preparing structured data for Google Sheets insertion.
Appends the extracted hiring manager data to a Google Sheet, creating a centralized database of job opportunities and their associated contacts.

parameters.content:
##  Triggers
Initiates the workflow every Monday at 9 AM to begin the LinkedIn job scraping process for hiring manager extraction.

##  Inputs
Calls Apify API to scrape LinkedIn job postings, retrieving job details including potential hiring manager information from job listings.

##  Transform
Processes the scraped job data to extract and format hiring manager information, preparing structured data for Google Sheets insertion.

##  Storage
Appends the extracted hiring manager data to a Google Sheet, creating a centralized database of job opportunities and their associated contacts.

##  Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with  by Ghost Team.

Calls Apify API to scrape LinkedIn job postings, retrieving job details including potential hiring manager information from job listings.
Processes the scraped job data to extract and format hiring manager information, preparing structured data for Google Sheets insertion.
Appends the extracted hiring manager data to a Google Sheet, creating a centralized database of job opportunities and their associated contacts.

discovered.purpose: Use Google Sheets as an AI tool for reading/writing data
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Make a simple GET request to retrieve data from an API
Trigger workflow every Monday to start the LinkedIn job scraping process

workflow.name: LinkedIn Job Scraper with Hiring Manager Extraction

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every Monday at 9 AM to begin the LinkedIn job scraping process for hiring manager extraction.
Calls Apify API to scrape LinkedIn job postings, retrieving job details including potential hiring manager information from job listings.
Processes the scraped job data to extract and format hiring manager information, preparing structured data for Google Sheets insertion.
Appends the extracted hiring manager data to a Google Sheet, creating a centralized database of job opportunities and their associated contacts.

workflow.name: LinkedIn Job Scraper with Hiring Manager Extraction

parameters.content:
##  Triggers
Initiates the workflow every Monday at 9 AM to begin the LinkedIn job scraping process for hiring manager extraction.

##  Inputs
Calls Apify API to scrape LinkedIn job postings, retrieving job details including potential hiring manager information from job listings.

##  Transform
Processes the scraped job data to extract and format hiring manager information, preparing structured data for Google Sheets insertion.

##  Storage
Appends the extracted hiring manager data to a Google Sheet, creating a centralized database of job opportunities and their associated contacts.

##  Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with  by Ghost Team.
